entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 3:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:54 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 1:54 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 1:54 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
